𒊬𒊒𒌝𒄀𒅔 Šar-ru-um-ki-in Šarumkin > Sargon

𒄀 GIᵒⁿ in Sargon 𒊬 𒊒𒄀 shar king cane 𒄀

סַרְגֵל sargél sergent "ruler" > स्केल skel

𒄊 ≈ 𒀲 in 𒄊𒀴 šaginaʳ 𒀲𒀴 šakkan₆ saxon shirkan sharking šaginaʳ.ᵃˡ general 𒄊𒀴 GÌR.NÍTA governor-general #šakkanak

Sargon's sons and greatsons gave rise to an enormous cult, after a "world empire" followed a "world religion":

𓇳 𓄟 𓋴 𓋴 Raj Moses Ramesses Rimush هرمز Hormoz 𒌷𒈬𒍑 Urumuuš Ahura Mazda at Mizraim

𒌷𒈬𒍑 Rimush, son of Sargon

𒈠𒀭𒅖𒌅𒋢 Ma-an-ish-tu-su Manishtusu, son of Sargon and Queen Tashlultum <> Menes Amun

𒂗 𒃶 𒌌𒀭𒈾 EN KÁM-ᵠUL-AN-NA Enheduanna

Moses as founder of a world religion. The paralells between the myth of Rimuš's father, Ramesses and Moses are striking: orphan floating in a basket…

Naram-Sin’s name is already written with the divine determinative

𓇳 𓄟 𓋴 𓋴 Ramesses fathers Seti, Setnakhte

𒌷𒈬𒍑 Urumuuš <> Abraham ?
